column1: 21783,Guardians of the Galaxy (2008) #4,4,40264,58,"When their HQ is sabotaged, the universe's scrappiest squad of butt-kickers must ask themselves: ""Who do you trust?"" Is there a Skrull amongst the Guardians? Maybe the recently returned and revamped Adam Warlock? Or Star-Lord? Rocket Racoon? ",
